short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables copying on certain sites, forcing you to type it out.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you learn more efficiently. It disables copying from certain sites, forcing you to type it out.

This project is open source, check it out https://github.com/jaxgeller/type-it-out.

It comes preloaded to disable copying on Stackoverflow and MDN. To add filters to this list, see the options under chrome://extensions.
